dialog.text: You fought well on the battlefield. I would be honored to fight by your side. Let me know once you are ready, and I will reset this save file to the beginning of the game, but with me in your party. Be warned, though, the enemies will be more difficult.

ai_sprite.name: kingmen
ai_sprite.dialog: Hello, Lachoneus sir. We will maintain order in the capital while you help defeat Zemnarihah.

ai_sprite.name: kingmen
ai_sprite.dialog: Hello, Pahoran sir. We will maintain order in the capital while you retake our cities, as you have commanded. The cities east of the desert are accessible by way of Nephihah.

ai_sprite.name: alma
ai_sprite.dialog: I gave up the judgment seat so that I can focus my efforts to teaching this people and bringing them to repentance. Nephihah has been chosen by the people as the new chief judge. I'm sorry I can't accompany you into battle anymore. Please see what Nephihah has to say.

ai_sprite.name: kingmen
ai_sprite.dialog: Hello, Alma sir. We will maintain order in the capital while you head off Amlici's army. His fortifications are at Minon, on the other side of the mountains to the west.

dialog.text: Your journey has finally come to an end. These people owe you a great debt of gratitude for what you have done, Moronihah. You have defended the cause of freedom with a zeal that would do honor to your father and his legacy. The robbers have been defeated, and the Lamanites have entered into a covenant of peace with us. May God bless this people so long as they live in righteousness, and may the voice of the people be upheld and the judges rule with equity for generations.
I grow weary of leading from the confines of this palace. May I join you in the fight against Zemnarihah?

prompt.next_dialog: Please let me know if you need my assistance later.

dialog.text: Don't think that the execution of Nehor will go unnoticed. His followers have already assembled under the leadership of Amlici. We will gain the voice of the people to anoint him as king and do away with the judges. But Moroni, I am not as patient as Amlici. I will avenge Nehor here and now!

Nephi: So passes Pahoran, son of Nephihah. This treachery must be stopped or it will only get worse. I need to gather some supplies at my house. Meet me there, and I will join you so that we can root out this secret band together.
